=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum Cleaner - Blackhead Vacuum Comedone Extractor Tool Device Comedo Suction Kit Electric Face Nose Blackhead Whitehead Remover with 4 Replaceable Suction Head
Review Date: 2019/07/12
Store: coppy
Product Description: ["don't buy !!!"]
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.81 x 3.03 x 1.89 inches; 5.71 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '705586525663'}
Review Text: So this little devise exceeded my expectations - try this on the back of your hand before trying it on your face. This thing is really powerful even on the mildest setting. You have to keep this moving or it will bruise you! Use it on the lowest setting fits while you getting used to it. Best use on freshly steamed skin. I only using this on my nose since this is so powerful I am concerned I will end up with red lines on my face.
Review Title: What a powerful little tool!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BABEYOND Roaring 20s Forehead Band 1920s Bridal Headpiece Vintage Forehead Chain for Wedding Bridesmaid Gatsby Costume Accessories with Gift Box
BABEYOND
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 7.28 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
I got this headpiece as a photography prop and part for my costume for an upcoming masquerade ball. Let me tell  you - this is a headband style crown and absolutely gorgeous! It looks much more expensive, it is sparkley and highly detailed. I love the chain details that go over the forehead. It does not look anywhere like real diamonds - but more like good quality costume piece. My first photoshoot with this crown was a child model portrait session - and it did not disappoint. What I love about it that it is a headband style - it is slightly flexible - so it can fit adult or child head just fine. It does pinch a little if tilted forward, but if worn over the top of the head - it is fine. This can be dressed up many ways - as a princess, flapper, belly dancer and more.. I really love this headpiece and will definitely use it for more creative photoshoots and for my own costume.
Gorgeous! Unique headpiece!
Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum Cleaner - Blackhead Vacuum Comedone Extractor Tool Device Comedo Suction Kit Electric Face Nose Blackhead Whitehead Remover with 4 Replaceable Suction Head

So this little devise exceeded my expectations - try this on the back of your hand before trying it on your face. This thing is really powerful even on the mildest setting. You have to keep this moving or it will bruise you! Use it on the lowest setting fits while you getting used to it. Best use on freshly steamed skin. I only using this on my nose since this is so powerful I am concerned I will end up with red lines on my face.
What a powerful little tool!
profile:
User Profile Summary:

- **Interests**: Costuming, photography, and themed events (e.g., masquerade balls and creative photoshoots), with a newfound interest in grooming tools that enhance personal care and appearance.
- **Style Preference**: Appreciates vintage and glamorous accessories, particularly those that evoke historical eras (e.g., Roaring 20s).
- **Functionality**: Values versatility in fashion items and beauty tools, seeking pieces that can serve multiple roles (e.g., suitable for both adults and children).
- **Quality Awareness**: Drawn to products that appear high-quality, whether in accessories or skincare devices—favoring items with visual appeal and effectiveness without a high cost.
- **Comfort Considerations**: Considers comfort in wear and use, indicating awareness of fit and usability while maintaining aesthetic appeal and safe application.
- **Event Enthusiasm**: Displays a high level of enthusiasm for events that allow for creativity and self-expression through costume, as well as a commitment to personal grooming that complements their aesthetic choices.

The user blends a passion for elegant, unique accessories and creative self-expression with an emerging focus on tools that enhance their beauty routine, reinforcing their commitment to a polished appearance for various occasions.
